text: Pejman Bazeghi (; born August 10, 1974 in Tehran) is an Iranian actor. He became a more prominent actor in 2004 after starring in the movie Duel, which won six awards at the 22nd Fajr International Film Festival. == References == * == Other websites == * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Tehran
title: Pejman Bazeghi
